mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (memberNo, memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberNickName, memberBirthDate, memberEmail, memberPhone, memberAddress, memberGrant) values(seq_member_no.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickName}, #{memberBirthDate}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberGrant})
